content: pop can/beer can cozy worsted weight yarn yarn used in photo left - red heart super saver - neon stripe right - i love this cotton - pistache 4 00mm g hook darning needle scissors stitch markers notes the chain 2 in each double_crochet round does not count as a stitch stitch abbreviations single_crochet single_crochet increase increase 2 stitches in the designated st double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain pattern round 1 6sc in a magic_ring 6 round 2 increase around 12 round 3 single_crochet increase 18 round 4 single_crochet single_crochet increase 24 round 5 single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet increase 30 round 6 single_crochet around in blo slip_stitch ch2 30 round 7 double_crochet in the same stitch as the chain 2 double_crochet in the next st and each round 30 round 8 single_crochet in the first st and in each around 30 round 9-18 repeat rounds 7 and * alternately ending with a single_crochet round that should reach to just underneath the lip of the can
